title: Werelion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, kill and clean a random visitor
- During a New Moon, roleblock one other player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you don't select a target, you will kill one random visitor at your home on Full Moon Nights.
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
Pride
Roleblock your target in addition to killing a random visitor
